original_text: God did not accept Abraham as right with him because Abraham had done good things. If God had done that, then Abraham would have been able to boast about himself. But he could not boast to God.
korean_text: 만일 아브라함이 행위로써 의롭다 하심을 받았으면 자랑할 것이 있으려니와 하나님 앞에서는 없느니라

sentences.original_text: God did not accept Abraham as right with him
because Abraham had done good things
then Abraham would have been able to boast about himself
sentences.korean_translation: 아브라함은 자기 자신을 자랑할 수 있었을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: But he could not boast to God
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그는 하나님 앞에서 자랑할 수 없었습니다
